extendedInfo.description: Price Compare makes it easy to perform price comparisons and add new prices both at home and on the go.Use this app and find hidden deals during this time of price inflation. Is it really worth it to buy in bulk? Is that "sale" really a sale compared to the regular store you go to? These are just two examples of questions Price Compare helps answer.Once you've created products for the app to track, simply enter a price, amount and unit at the top of the screen (see screenshots) and compare unit prices instantly in the list view. Want to update a price to an existing product in the list? Just click on it and pick your store. That's it! You're done!Enter prices as you skim through flyers, walk down an aisle at a grocery store or while you go through your old receipts. All that info comes in handy the next time you see a supposed "sale" at the store.The items in the list view will colour code themselves according to the price entered at the top. Green means it's a deal! Red means you've found better prices previously.Full Version Features- Unlimited Categories- Unlimited Stores- Convert liquids and unitsFree Version Limitations (Purchase the unlock key to remove these restrictions):- Max 5 categories- Max 5 stores- Max 10 Products- Only mass amounts can be compared (mg, g, kg, oz, lb)Features:- By entering price, amount and mass/volume you can compare against previously entered prices instantly. Conversions between imperial/metric are performed automatically- Builtin tool recommends prices as you enter them- Categorize products under one or more categories- Track stores along with prices to build a price history- Use a star rating to rate product quality when comparing across various brands- Supports metric and imperial system for Mass (mg, g, kg, oz, lb) and Volume (mL, L, oz, gal, oz(uk), gal(uk))- Unit count is comparisons such as 6 units in Product A vs 4 units in Product B.- Quickly compare various quantities of items to find the best deal- View both via $/Amount and Amount/$- Many opportunities to compare and save, from groceries to gas, track anything that is sold by mass/volume.Perfect for the frugal shopper, or for anyone looking for the best deals and prices. There's no need to plan ahead for a shopping trip, as all the info is already with your Android device.FAQHow do I delete a product?To delete a product you can go to the Manage Products screen by clicking the menu button on the main screen of the app (the one which appears when you first start the app) and pressing the menu key on the device. Once you reach the products screen you can do a long touch on the product you want to delete.How do I delete a price from a product?To delete a price entered on a product click on the product in either the main screen or Manage Products screen. This will take you to the Product Details screen. From there, click the History tab to show the prices. Long touch the entry you want to delete and select "Delete" from the popup menu.Permissions:- Internet access is used for crash reporting and Google Analytics

reviews.title: Like it.
reviews.comment: Simple to use works well. Would be nice to scan bar code for product interview.
reviews.author: Brian Burchart

reviews.title: One of the best price compare app
reviews.comment: 1. Please include more units. 2. Allow user to manually create unit type.  3. Allow user to capture and add product photon
reviews.author: Terence Chan

reviews.title: Very helpful and useful
reviews.comment: Its the only app I know of that will save the calculations for later review. Very helpful. Thanks!
reviews.author: EON Starr

reviews.title: Simple and does the job, but could be better.
reviews.comment: This simple app allows you to calculate & save unit prices by store & date, but with two maddening quirks. (1) On the summary page, the best and worst prices are shown without displaying their stores. This means you have to do some hunting to find out which store has te best price after enter all the data. (2) Every time you add a new item, every item on the summary page converts to the same unit (e.g., once you enter a price for bulk lunch meat, even liquid laundry detergent is displayed in pounds).
reviews.author: Alyssa Andersen

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Love how I can save the price from each store for one product. I will always pay the best price with this app! It\'d be nice if the best store price was easier to get to. Maybe they\'re working on that, for now I don\'t mind a few clicks and the time to get there. Also I want best/worst price to show which store that price is from.
reviews.author: Crystal Popish

reviews.title: Needs more flexibility
reviews.comment: Need to add other units before weight. Litres, each, etc.
reviews.author: Corrie Dossenbach

reviews.title: Great improvments
reviews.comment: Changed my feedback. Like this app for comparing warehouse prices to the supermarket.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lacking a few things that could improve
reviews.comment: No way to export data. Where is the bar code reader. Store not listed on browse.
reviews.author: Peter Wood

reviews.title: Needs more features
reviews.comment: App seems to work as described; but lacks features that would increase use, such as a barcode scanner.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good experience
reviews.comment: would be perfect if add barcode
reviews.author: Yibo Long
